name: Postgresql Single Node
description:
PostgreSQL is an object-relational database management system (ORDBMS) with an emphasis on extensibility and standards compliance.
This app creates a single PostgreSQL VM.
For evaluation purposes only. Not recommended for production use.
#### License:
* PostgreSQL License
#### Hardware Requirement:
* By default, one VM with 2 vCPU and 4GB RAM
#### Resources Installed:
* Postgresql 9.6
#### Operating System:
* CentOS Linux release 7.4-1801-01
* Select the [AMI](https://goo.gl/td2eJJ) according to the region on AWS.
* Select the [Image](https://goo.gl/DCSSqw) according to the zone on GCP.
#### Platform:
* AHV
* AWS
* GCP
#### Lifecycle:
* Backup
* Restore
#### Limitations:
* Upgrade lifecycle management is not available.
#### Other Instructions:
* Open port `5432`
#### Accessibility:
* `sudo su - postgres sh -c psql`
author: Nutanix
